channel.title: Making blank screen in safe zone but skull in wildy

item.title: Making blank screen in safe zone but skull in wildy
item.dc:creator: @spleen15 spleen15
item.description:
@spleen15 wrote:

here’s my WriteWildyLevel code:

public void WriteWildyLevel() { if (nonWild()){ RemoveAllWindows(); } else { outStream.createFrame(208); // woot new pk server by Casella outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199); } }

And here’s my public void update:

[code] public void update()
{
handler.updatePlayer(this, outStream);
handler.updateNPC(this, outStream);

	sendFrame126("Click To Log Out", 2458);

	flushOutStream();

if (nonWild()){
RemoveAllWindows();
} else {
outStream.createFrame(208); // woot new pk server by Casella
outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197);
sendQuest("@red@Wild", 199);
}
}[/code]

When I’m out of wildy it’s fine, then I walk into it and it works. But when I walk out of it again, the skull and writing stays. Any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: Making blank screen in safe zone but skull in wildy
